alert.note: Alert for Appling; Atkinson; Bacon; Brantley; Clinch; Coastal Camden; Coastal Glynn; Coffee; Echols; Inland Camden; Inland Glynn; Jeff Davis; Northeastern Charlton; Northern Ware; Pierce; Southern Ware; Wayne; Western Charlton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued May 02 at 5:38PM EDT until May 03 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON FOR DANGEROUS FIRE CONDITIONS FOR SOUTHEAST GA AND NORTHEAST FL... The National Weather Service in Jacksonville has issued a Fire Weather Watch for dangerous fire conditions, which is in effect Wednesday afternoon. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zone 020 Hamilton, Fire Weather Zone 021 Suwannee, Fire Weather Zone 023 Baker, Fire Weather Zone 024 Inland Nassau, Fire Weather Zone 030 Union, Fire Weather Zone 031 Bradford, Fire Weather Zone 033 Inland St. Johns, Fire Weather Zone 035 Gilchrist, Fire Weather Zone 038 Inland Flagler, Fire Weather Zone 122 Northern Columbia, Fire Weather Zone 124 Coastal Nassau, Fire Weather Zone 125 Coastal Duval, Fire Weather Zone 132 Eastern Clay, Fire Weather Zone 132 Coffee, Fire Weather Zone 133 Coastal St. Johns, Fire Weather Zone 133 Jeff Davis, Fire Weather Zone 134 Bacon, Fire Weather Zone 135 Appling, Fire Weather Zone 136 Eastern Alachua, Fire Weather Zone 136 Wayne, Fire Weather Zone 137 Eastern Putnam, Fire Weather Zone 138 Coastal Flagler, Fire Weather Zone 140 Eastern Marion, Fire Weather Zone 149 Atkinson, Fire Weather Zone 151 Pierce, Fire Weather Zone 152 Brantley, Fire Weather Zone 153 Inland Glynn, Fire Weather Zone 154 Coastal Glynn, Fire Weather Zone 162 Echols, Fire Weather Zone 163 Clinch, Fire Weather Zone 165 Inland Camden, Fire Weather Zone 166 Coastal Camden, Fire Weather Zone 222 Southern Columbia, Fire Weather Zone 225 Trout River, Fire Weather Zone 232 Western Clay, Fire Weather Zone 236 Western Alachua, Fire Weather Zone 237 Western Putnam, Fire Weather Zone 240 Central Marion, Fire Weather Zone 250 Northern Ware, Fire Weather Zone 264 Northeastern Charlton, Fire Weather Zone 325 South Central Duval, Fire Weather Zone 340 Western Marion, Fire Weather Zone 350 Southern Ware, Fire Weather Zone 364 Western Charlton and Fire Weather Zone 425 Western Duval. * TIMING... Wednesday afternoon. * WINDS...West 15 to 20 mph with gusts up to 30 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 24 percent. * TEMPERATURES...In the upper 70s. * LIGHTNING... Not expected.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.
